alert.note: Alert for Lycoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 24 at 4:26PM EDT until July 24 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN LYCOMING AND SOUTHEASTERN TIOGA COUNTIES... At 426 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Mansfield to Ogdensburg to Trout Run, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Blossburg, Covington, Arnot, Ralston, Ogdensburg, Cammal, English Center, Barbours, Buttonwood, Trout Run and Ski Sawmill Ski Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
